__3Steps__:
3 simple steps
 to make your pet happier
__TellMeTwo__:
Tell me about the problem
 or ask a question that interests you
__Извините, ваш микрофон...__:
Sorry, your microphone is off,
 turn it on and try again
__Извините, ваш интернет...__:
Sorry, your internet connection
 is unstable, please try again later
__Извините, ваш браузер...__:
Sorry, your browser doesn't support
 speech recognition, please type your question
__FAQ-examples-1__: What exercises and games will be good for my pet's health and development?
__FAQ-examples-2__: How do I take care of my pet's coat and nails on a daily basis?
__FAQ-examples-3__: What vaccinations should my pet get and at what age?
__FAQ-restrictions-1__: Not to be used for diagnosis or self-treatment of a pet.
__FAQ-restrictions-2__: Avoid questions about medications, their dosage and purpose.
__FAQ-restrictions-3__: In case of emergency, contact a veterinarian.
__Welcome message__:
Welcome to the world of pet care and love! 
 
 I am your virtual assistant, I will help you in all matters related to the care of your pets. Here you will find useful tips, reliable recommendations and proven ways to ensure your pets have a happy and healthy life.
 
 Shall we start?
__ForWHo-heading__:
Our service will be useful
 if you:
__ForWHo-text-1__: do not see the urgent need to take the pet to the vet and spend time and money on it
__ForWHo-text-2__: you are abroad or out of town and your pet needs emergency help
__ForWHo-text-3__: just about to get a pet but can't decide
__ForWHo-text-4__: want to get advice on food selection and diet planning
__ForWHo-text-5__: need a transcript or confirmation of your pet's diagnosis and prescription
__ForWHo-text-6__: interested in animals and want to learn more about their breeds, traits and habits
